name: The Amazing Spider Man: Lethal Foes
name_original: The Amazing Spider Man: Lethal Foes
description:
The Amazing Spider Man: Lethal Foes is an action game developed by Epoch and Argent. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Epoch Co.. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The Amazing Spider Man: Lethal Foes on SNES.
